#summary Temperature Controller to regulate a Peltier Element with up to 2,5A of Heating/Cooling current.

= Introduction =

Temperature Controller to regulate a Peltier Element with up to 2,5A of Heating/Cooling current.  Feedback is obtained through a NTC Thermistor, which the IC feeds through a PI Control Loop to regulate the temperature.
